item.title: Liltag - A Simple Tag Manager for Your Website
item.description: Liltag is a straightforward JavaScript tag manager that lets you dynamically load scripts on your website. With just 250 lines of code, Liltag uses a JSON configuration to manage tags, operates without cookies, doesnâ€™t track your users, and is GDPR compliant.

item.title: Development for the Soul: How to Cope with Lack of Time and Motivation
item.description: In my free time away from managerial work, I enjoy working on small development projects, however, like many other developers, I face two main constraints: motivation and free time.
